name: Royal Plea
description:
What is Royal Plea?

A 3d, top down, board game where you play as a king/queen. The citizens of your kingdom have demands of you and you must answer. 

How do you play?

You place tiles on the board. Match 4+ symbols by touching them. Matching symbols collects them, giving you resources. You'll see your resources on the right: Food, Water, Production, Culture, Faith, and Science. You can complete the demands on your citizens (on the left) by clicking on the resources they require. Once you've completed all your citizens demands, you win!
